column5: Howdy!  Joined here a few weeks ago and only just got permission to post. I still cannot post or reply to a few folks in the classifieds. I wanted to purchase a few items which have since sold.  Any help is appreciated.
believe you have to post a minimum # of times to fully access classifieds.  And by the way, welcome. You will enjoy this most helpful and wonderful site.
Yep, post great report in a few reports and get your post count up, then you can post in the classifieds.  S.
So in order to say  "Hey can I give you my $$$"  I have to just up my posts????
People feel better buying and selling from someone they know a little about, otherwise they could put it on kijiji.
Yes, PM works as well.  S.

We have in the past had people who joined just to sell items or to get on the great deals our members extend to the community. So we have a 20 post minimum to be able to buy or sell for all of our protection. Feel free to P.M. the seller or better yet start posting meaningful comments or a thread to get to the 20 milestone you are wanting.   Art
Wow!  Thanks guys I see the logic in that for sure!  Thank you
Welcome aboard Jimmy! Post up you wont regret it!  Soon youll be OFC family?
Welcome! Soon you will be like me. On 2 to 3 times a day. Can't get enough.  I'm pretty confident you will enjoy it
ooooops. Hit the post button too much........   Not a recommended method of boosting your post count!
Welcome Jimmy. For some reason I don't think it will take very long to get your numbers up.  Cheers
Hi Jimmy, welcome to the forum. Why not post a quick intro? Where do you fish? What do you like to fish for? Oh, and pictures...pictures are good.

Welcome Jimmy. For some reason I don't think it will take very long to get your numbers up.  Hehehe!!!  Jimmy, you're one busy dood on the net and adding this place will only double that. lol.  Enjoy.
